text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza mulaalikiddwako nti ekibonerezo ky'oyo aba atemudde kumutta; omwana waboowo attibwa olw'okutta omwana wabobwe, n'omuddu attibwa olw'okutta muddu munne, n'omukazi attibwa ku lwokutta mukazi munne. Asse, bannannyini mufu bwe baba bamusonyiye ekintu kyonna, ababanja bateekwa okubanja mu ngeri nnungi, n'abasasula basasule mu ngeri y'emu. Okwo kwe kuwewula n'okusaasira, ebyava eri Katonda wa mmwe. (Oluvanyuma lw'okusasula) oyo alumba n'atta eyasonyiyiddwa naye ateekwa okuweebwa ekibonerezo ekiruma nga ky'akuttibwa (awatali kusonyiyibwa oba okuwa engassi)
